title: Site wount update my account cant create discussions
body: My account is level 20 but cant create discussion (site says level 7)

replies.body: Posting here synced up your Boards profile with your Summoner level! I can see you as level 21 now and you should be free to post wherever ^_^!
Looks like it's updated for you now :) Sometimes it just takes a post/comment to give the boards a wake up call!
